mission.name: First blocks
mission.briefing: Hello. So you are the one that wishes to beat me? Let`s see what you can do.

mission.name: Red
mission.briefing: You did good, but can you win on RED?!

mission.name: Walk in a park
mission.briefing: I`ve changed the rules so it's more natural. Now it's a forest simulator.

mission.name: Underwater gems
mission.briefing: Have you seen that movie about a shark that eats people? I hope memory of that movie won't make you too scared to get near the water.

mission.name: The minelayer
mission.briefing: If you win that one, you'll get some explosives. Don't hurt yourself.

mission.name: Tick tock
mission.briefing: Take your time while playing this one. You have plenty. No pressure. Don't hurry yourself.

mission.name: Careful
mission.briefing: Have you ever made a mistake? Don't do one now. I'm watching.

mission.name: Survival camp
mission.briefing: You'll unlock a time eater if you win this one.

mission.name: Orbastic
mission.briefing: Are you afraid of orbs? I'm not, I'm a game, but if you are, you may wish not to play this one.

mission.name: Chronoboost
mission.briefing: This time eater is a bit more literal.

mission.name: The colour eraser
mission.briefing: There is a prize. Don't abuse it once you get it.

mission.name: Freeze!
mission.briefing: I know you think I'm easy. I'll change your mind after that one though.

mission.name: Rush hour
mission.briefing: Tick, tack, tick, tack... I just recalled I need to buy some office supplies. Weird.

mission.name: Fear is an illusion
mission.briefing: I would like to reward you, but you must earn the prize.

mission.name: A solid block
mission.briefing: Have you ever had a problem with erasing three? Now you'll have a problem with erasing one!

mission.name: Grey goo
mission.briefing: Grey goo is an indicator that there is a virus. It may also mean that you have some cleaning to do instead of beating me.

mission.name: Repainting reality
mission.briefing: When was the last time you changed your wallpaper?

mission.name: Marshmallow Man
mission.briefing: If you feed candy to your phone it will die or get sticky.

mission.name: Belmont jazz
mission.briefing: It's the last of the easy ones.

mission.name: Hardcore
mission.briefing: If win this one, you'll become the official game beater!
